New Records: The Boston Celtics set an NBA record by making 29 three-pointers in a game
Key Match Events: Jayson Tatum scored 37 points and made eight three-pointers
The Celtics led by as many as 35 points early in the third quarter
The crowd chanted 'Yankees Suck!' when the Celtics were leading by more than 20 points early in the third quarter
Pre-Game Insights: The Celtics raised their NBA-most 18th championship banner to the rafters before the game
The new-look Knicks were expected to be the biggest threat to the Celtics in the Eastern Conference
Post-Match Reflections: For years, political scientist Scott Yenor has advocated for certain policies
The American Civil Liberties Union has filed a lawsuit accusing Florida Governor Ron DeSantis of not calling special elections as required by law
Miscellaneous Highlights: On July 28, U.S. Olympic basketball coach Steve Kerr benched Tatum for a game against Serbia, guaranteeing Tatum would be motivated for the Celtics' title defense
